2.9.3 Sequential diagram

testcase.preconditions:
Software Requirement

 Front end:

 - Android developer tool

 - Advance Java

 Back end:

 - MySQL

Hardware Requirement

 - Android version 2.3 ginger bread(minimum, android user’s)

 - 2GB ram

 - 1.2 GHz processor

 - Intel i5

 - Windows 7/8/8.1/10

Internet connection

User exists

Librarian exists

Admin exists

Communication between user and admin exists

Communication between librarian and admin exists

 

SETUP: Enter application

step.actions: Wait for registration data from the user
step.expectedresults: Registration data from the user has arrived

step.actions: Check if user email and mobile number is valid
step.expectedresults: User email and mobile number is valid

step.actions: Send user registration data to the database
step.expectedresults: User registration data has been sent to the database

step.actions: Wait for response from the database that user registration data has been written to the database
step.expectedresults: Response that user registration data has been written has arrived from the database

step.actions: Send response about successful registration to the user
step.expectedresults: Response about successful registration has been sent to the user

step.actions: Wait for registration data from the librarian
step.expectedresults: Registration data from the librarian has arrived

step.actions: Check if librarian email and mobile number is valid
step.expectedresults: Librarian email and mobile number is valid

step.actions: Send librarian registration data to the database
step.expectedresults: Librarian registration data has been sent to the database

step.actions: Wait for response from the database that librarian registration data has been written to the database
step.expectedresults: Response that librarian registration data has been written has arrived from the database

step.actions: Send response about successful registration to the librarian
step.expectedresults: Response about successful registration has been sent to the librarian

step.actions: Wait for login request from the user
step.expectedresults: Login request has arrived from the user

step.actions: Send user login data to the database
step.expectedresults: User login data has been sent to the database

step.actions: Wait for user login validation from the database
step.expectedresults: Response about valid user has been sent to the database

step.actions: Send response about successful logon to the user
step.expectedresults: Response about successful login has been sent to the user

step.expectedresults: Request for returning book has arrived from the user
